00017 #include "MisrSetRegion.h"
00018 #include "MisrCoordQuery.h"
00019 #include "MisrError.h"
00020 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00021 #include "MisrOrbitPath.h"
00022 
00037 MTKt_status MtkSetRegionByPathSomUlcLrc(
00038   int path,         
00039   double ulc_som_x, 
00040   double ulc_som_y, 
00041   double lrc_som_x, 
00042   double lrc_som_y, 
00043   MTKt_Region *region  )
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status;       /* Return status */
00046   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00047   MTKt_Region rgn;      /* Region structure */
00048   double ctr_som_x;     /* Center of region in SOM X */
00049   double ctr_som_y;     /* Center of region in SOM Y */
00050 
00051   if (region == NULL)
00052     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00053 
00054   /* Check path bounds */
00055   if (path < 1 || path > 233)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00057 
00058   /* Check SOM X bounds */
00059   if (lrc_som_x < ulc_som_x)
00060     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00061 
00062   /* Check SOM Y bounds */
00063   if (lrc_som_y < ulc_som_y)
00064     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00065 
00066   /* Determine center of region in lat/lon coordinates */
00067 
00068   ctr_som_x = ulc_som_x + ((lrc_som_x - ulc_som_x) / 2.0);
00069   ctr_som_y = ulc_som_y + ((lrc_som_y - ulc_som_y) / 2.0);
00070 
00071   status = MtkSomXYToLatLon(path, ctr_som_x, ctr_som_y,
00072                 &rgn.geo.ctr.lat, &rgn.geo.ctr.lon);
00073 
00074   /* Half of the over all extent to measure from center */
00075   rgn.hextent.xlat = (lrc_som_x - ulc_som_x + MAXRESOLUTION) / 2.0;
00076   rgn.hextent.ylon = (lrc_som_y - ulc_som_y + MAXRESOLUTION) / 2.0;
00077 
00078   *region = rgn;
00079 
00080   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00081 
00082 ERROR_HANDLE:
00083   return status_code;
00084 }
